## hpr0604 :: Community Run Projects

 Links to projects talked about:

Free Rainbow Tables
https://www.freerainbowtables.com

Boinc
https://boinc.berkeley.edu/projects.php

Archive Team
https://www.archiveteam.org
https://www.archiveteam.org/index.php?title=GeoCities
Security B-Sides
https://www.securitybsides.com
Infosec Mentors Project
https://infosecmentors.com
Hackerspaces
https://hackerspaces.org/wiki/
https://makerslocal.org/
Open Source Software Projects
https://sourceforge.net/
https://github.com/

Code Raid
https://www.reddit.com/r/coderaid


You can find sp0rus at his blog
https://www.squaringcircles.blogspot.com
on twitter @jmstitt and on IRC.
